phrs.translation: 聚对苯二甲酸乙二醇酯
聚氧化乙烯；聚环氧乙烷

sentences.sentence: As an additional safeguard against weeds you can always use an underlay of heavy duty polyethylene.
sentences.translation: 作为另外一种预防杂草的防护措施，你可以一直使用一层厚重耐磨的聚乙烯底垫。

sentences.sentence: Polyethylene (PE) model of spin one-time molding process autopoietic.
sentences.translation: 聚乙烯（PE）旋塑成工艺一次性模式成型。

sentences.sentence: Polyethylene is also easy-to-clean and stain resistant.
sentences.translation: 聚乙烯容易清洗且耐脏。
